release_notes.en-US:
Release 1.0.6.3 of BirthdayReminder is now compatible with Thunderbird 5.0. It is not compatible with Thunderbird 3.x - please install version 1.0.5.2 if you want to use Birthdayreminder with Thunderbird 3.x.

Changes in version 1.0.6.3
- Necessary updates for compatibility with Thunderbird 5.0
- BirthdayReminder is now compatible with Lightning 1.x
- Bugfix: BirthdayReminder now shows error messages when Lightning calendar not found or read-only

Added the following locales  (thanks to all the people who contributed):
- ca-AD: Catalan by Opakoman,rubenix
- cs-CZ: Czech by Joelp
- de: German by BirthdayReminder
- it-IT: Italian by Underpass
- hu-HU: Hungarian by Cashman       
- vi: Vietnamese by longnh

text.en-US: You are free to use Birthday Reminder with any of the applications or services offered by Mozilla. All Other Rights Reserved.

release_notes.en-US:
Version 1.0.5.2
- Improvement: Update for Thunderbird 3.x
- Bugfix: Namesspaces introduced (Reviewer comment)
- Bugfix: enable_Privilege function removed  (Unsafe - Reviewer comment)
- Added the following locales for 1.0.5.2 (thanks to all the poeple who contributed):
       ca-AD: Catalan by Opakoman,rubenix
       cs-CZ: Czech by Joelp
       es-ES: Spanish by chuzo
       hu-HU: Hungarian by Cashman
       it-IT: Italian by Underpass
       lt-LT: Lithuanian by tomasdd
       nl   : Dutch by markh
       pt-PT: Portuguese (Portugal) by lloco
       zh-TW: Chinese (Traditional) by kennith

Changes 
Improvement: BirthdayReminder now links you to other services if you want to send flowers, gift certificates or gifts. 
Improvement: It is now possible to customize the event's title when synchronizing with Lightning 
Improvement: Lightning's alarm functionality can now be used. 
Improvement: Lightning Synchronization can now be started from the menu. 
Improvement: It can be configured, if a the birthday list window shows when no birthday is present. 
Improvement: It can be configured, which calendar for Lightning synchronization is to be used. Hint: you need to delete existing calendar entries in order to get an effect. 
Improvement: About-dialog now shows current information from www.mybirthdayreminder.org 
Bugfix: Reminder eMail now shows date of next birthday, not the date of birth 
Bugfix: UTF-8 encoding used for IFrame, using correct functions to get file URL 
Known issues
Syncing with Google Calendar results in duplicate entries. This behaviour is a result of the Google Calendar implementation: Google Calendar changes the IDs of the created events. Because of this, BirthdayReminder does not find the previously created event for the birthday and creates a new event. There will be no changes in Birthday Reminder because of this. Please report this problem to the Google Calendar Team if you would like to have it fixed. 
Birthday Reminder seems to hang when syncing a calender hosted in a WebDAV-Folder via https on gmx.de 
Supported locales
es-ES: Spanish by chuzo 
fr-FR: French by Arka 
it-IT: Italian by Underpass 
ja-JP: Japanese by drry 
hu-HU: Hungarian by Cashman 
ko-KR: Korean by wtspout 
nl-NL: Dutch by markh 
pt-PT: Portuguese (Portugal) by lloco 
sk-SK: Slovak by Branislav Rozbora 
zh-TW: Chinese (Traditional) by kennith 
Thanks to all the poeple who contributed localizations!

Version 1.0.3.2:
- Bugfix: Dates are sometimes shifted by one day during Ligthning synchronization

Version 1.0.3.1:
- Bugfix: Birthday Reminder now shows birthdays even if one addressbook is empty

Version 1.0.3:
- Birthday Reminder can now be installed into Thunderbird 2.0
- Added the following locales (thanks to all the poeple who contributed):
ko-KR: Korean by wtspout
sk-SK: Slovak by Branislav Rozbora
tr-TR: Turkish by ersenyoldac

Version 1.0.3.1:
- Bugfix: Birthday Reminder now shows birthdays even if one addressbook is empty

Version 1.0.3:
- Birthday Reminder can now be installed into Thunderbird 2.0
- Added the following locales (thanks to all the poeple who contributed):
	ko-KR: Korean by wtspout
	sk-SK: Slovak by Branislav Rozbora
	tr-TR: Turkish by ersenyoldac

Version 1.0.2: - Added the following locales (thanks to all the poeple who contributed): zh-CN: Chinese (Simplified) by fishbone zh-TW: Chinese (Traditional) by kennith hr-HR: Croatian by Krcko nl-NL: Dutch by markh fr-FR: French by Arka de-DE: German by infosenf hu-HU: Hungarian by Cashman it-IT: Italian by Underpass es-ES: Spanish (Spain) by chuzo Version 1.0.1: - Improvement: Reminders via eMail: BirthdayReminder can send you an eMails now to remind about upcoming birthdays. It can be configured how many days before the birthday the eMail is to be sent. Reminder eMails are sent to your default eMail identity. - Improvement: Reminders via Thunderbird Ligthning Calendar Extension: With this extension installed, BirthdayReminder can now create calendar events in the default calendar. Birthdays of your contacts are created as whole-day events. Tested with lightning-0.3.win32. (See also http://www.mozilla.org/projects/calendar/releases/lightning0.3.html) - Improvement: Support for MoreColsforAddressBook-Extension: This extension shows fields for contact information that are not visible by default in thunderbirds address book. These fields include fields for date of birth. With the extension installed, these fields can now be used for birthday information. Tested with morecols-0.3.4.7. (See also http://nic-nac-project.de/~kaosmos/morecols-en.html) - Improvement: Added new functionality in the configuration dialog [older version notes deleted]

Version 0.65:
- Added the following locales (thanks to all the poeple who contributed)
	zh-TW: Chinese (Traditional) by kennith
	da-DK: Danish by AlleyKat
	nl-NL: Dutch by markh
	en-US: English
	fr-FR: French by lebardy
	de-DE: German
	hu-HU: Hungarian by Cashman
	it-IT: Italian by Underpass
	pt-BR: Portuguese (Brazilian) by Rodrigo Bergmann Laurindo
	uk-UA: Ukrainian

Version 0.64
- Improvement: Added 'Translation provied by' in about dialog

Version 0.63:
- Bugfix: Reminder Windows closes when no birthdays are found in the configured timespan.

Version 0.62:
- Bugfix: Birthdays are not shown correctly when using multiple addressbooks
- Bugfix: Removed TAB-Character in description
- Bugfix: Wrong version info in About Dialog deleted
- Improvement: Localization: Field for Date of Birth can now be selected by dropdownbox localized names
- Improvement: Localization: Description can now be localized

Version 0.61:
- Bugfix: Internationization now possible for all GUI Elements

Version 0.60:
- A Configuration Dialog now exists to configure Field for date of birth and other things
- Birthday Reminder is now using Thunderbirds internal date conversion functions so the date format should be as you are used to in your part of the world :-)
- Birthday Reminder Window only shows on startup if configured to do so
- It is possible to configure how many birthdays are show in the Birthday Reminder window. For example you can configure to show birthdays of the next 30 days.
- In the Birthday Reminder Window there is a multicolumn Listbox now. This looks nicer to me.

Version 0.51
- Listbox on Birthdaylist Window now uses Multicolumn Listbox
- Configuration Dialog exists to configure Field for Birthday
- using Thunderbirds internal date conversion functions
- Birthdaylist Window only shows on startup if configured

Version 0.50:
- Initial Release

Version 0.60
- Configuration Dialog exists to configure Field for Date of Birth
- Birthday Reminder is now using Thunderbirds date conversion functions
- Birthdaylist Window only shows on startup if 
configured
- Listbox on Birthdaylist Window now uses Multicolumn Listbox

Tested:
- Mozilla Thunderbird 1.5.0.5 (with locale de-DE)

Field evaluated for Birthdays:
- default: "Custom1" 
- can be changed by setting "extensions.birtdayreminder.birthdayfieldname" in about:config

Date Formats:
- date format for german locale is "dd.MM.yyyy"
- date format for english (en-US) locale is "MM/dd/yyyy"
- can be set in a property "dateFormat" for each locale
